title: Attempting to reconnect bug
body:
Hi everyone! maybe this will be seen and answered on the new forums by riot. I've recently had a problem with my connection, it started around when the world championship login screen was implemented.

Whenever I enter a game in between 4-10minutes in I will normally get an "Attempting to reconnect" message that will happen about 2-4 times per game. its not my computer or my network, I got a new laptop and router in the past month.

Something different about these attempting to reconnect messages that I get that are different than the regular messages is a number of things.

First, when the message comes up, I can see the game still going on around me even though it says I'm not connected and it will show when someone dies and I can even see the chat being updated, but when I try to type something or move my champ, nothing happens and I can type in the chat but it will not show up to my team.

Second, when I disconnect, instead of my champion running back to the summoner platform like usual, they will just stand there, not moving, and I watch helplessly as the other team gets a free kill, and during the attempting to reconnect it will still show me I died, go black and white, and have the countdown timer as if I died... because I did.. because I was just standing there not able to do anything.

This problem is really annoying and I've been dominating a lane when this happens then all of the sudden I'm way behind in my lane. Instead of explaining this looong problem to my team, I just joke about how I should stop stealing McDonalds internet to play LoL. I know I'm not the only one with this problem so I hope it gets fixed soon.

Any help would be greatly appreciated,
Thanks! :D

replies.body:
Hey reundeadmadman,

I read through your post, and what you described is strongly indicative of an unstable connection.  Having this will cause exactly the experienced you had.

Because of this, please make sure to check out the following Knowledge Base Article that has many different steps on how you can help improve your connection:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21696815

When testing whether these changes helped, make sure that you try it out in Custom Games (with only bots) to see if it has improved.  This will ensure that you are not possibly ruining the gaming experience of others due to your connection.

Furthermore, if you are still experiencing issues with your connection, make sure that you open a new ticket to Player Support, which you can do so here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

If you do submit a ticket, make sure that you provide the following information so that we can investigate your issue further:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list
